statements: SELECT device_id, device_name, firmware_version, location_info, last_update FROM device_settings;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM device_settings WHERE firmware_version = '1.0';
SELECT * FROM device_settings WHERE last_update > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location_info FROM device_settings ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT device_name, location_info FROM device_settings WHERE device_name LIKE '%Device%' ORDER BY device_name;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM device_settings WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT device_name, firmware_version, location_info FROM device_settings WHERE firmware_version = '1.0' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_settings WHERE last_update > '2022-01-01' AND device_name LIKE '%sensor%';
SELECT device_name, location_info FROM device_settings WHERE location_info->>'city' = 'New York' OR location_info->>'country' = 'US';
SELECT device_name, firmware_version, last_update FROM device_settings ORDER BY last_update DESC, device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM DeviceConfigSettings
SELECT param_name, param_value, created_at FROM DeviceConfigSettings WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT * FROM DeviceConfigSettings ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT param_name, MAX(created_at) AS latest_created_at FROM DeviceConfigSettings GROUP BY param_name
SELECT DUS.update_version, DCS.param_value FROM DeviceUpdates DUS INNER JOIN DeviceConfigSettings DCS ON DUS.device_id = DCS.device_id
SELECT * FROM DeviceConfigSettings WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT param_name, param_value, created_at FROM DeviceConfigSettings WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, param_name, param_value, created_at FROM DeviceConfigSettings WHERE device_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT device_id, COUNT(update_id) AS total_updates FROM DeviceConfigSettings LEFT JOIN DeviceUpdates ON DeviceConfigSettings.device_id = DeviceUpdates.device_id GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_updates > 3;
SELECT device_id, update_version, update_description, updated_at FROM DeviceUpdates ORDER BY updated_at ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM configuration_settings
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM configuration_settings ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM configuration_settings WHERE setting_value = 'high'
SELECT * FROM device_parameters WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value, parameter_type FROM device_parameters
SELECT * FROM configuration_settings WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM configuration_settings WHERE last_updated > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY setting_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM device_parameters WHERE parameter_type = 'numeric' AND device_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT update_version, update_description FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01' AND device_id = 2;
SELECT COUNT(setting_id) AS total_settings, MAX(last_updated) AS latest_update FROM configuration_settings;
SELECT * FROM DeviceSettings;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM DeviceSettings WHERE firmware_version = 'v1.0';
SELECT device_id, configuration_settings FROM DeviceSettings WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DeviceLogs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_description FROM DeviceLogs WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM DeviceSettings WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM DeviceSettings WHERE firmware_version LIKE 'v%' ORDER BY firmware_version DESC;
SELECT command_id, command_type, command_details FROM DeviceCommands WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY command_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, log_timestamp, log_description FROM DeviceLogs WHERE device_id = 3 AND log_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_id, update_version FROM DeviceUpdates WHERE device_id = 4 AND update_version LIKE '%.0' ORDER BY update_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Device;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM Device WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT id, config_name, config_value FROM Configuration WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT version, description FROM Firmware ORDER BY released_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, update_description, update_date FROM UpdateLog WHERE update_status = 'successful';
SELECT * FROM Device;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM Device ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT id, device_name, firmware_version FROM Device WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT * FROM Configuration WHERE config_name LIKE 'network%';
SELECT device_name, version, released_date FROM Device JOIN Firmware ON Device.id = Firmware.device_id;
